original_body_lines: Indian cricket icon Sachin Tendulkar visited Sri Lanka today as a UNICEF ambassador for global humanitarian efforts.
During his visit, the cricket legend collaborated with Governor Navin Dissanayaka and UNICEF representatives to make an impactful visit to a preschool in the picturesque Sabaragamuwa Province.

The purpose of this visit was to shine a light on the essential work being done by UNICEF in partnership with foreign and local authorities to enhance early childhood education and support for the children of Sri Lanka.
